item.title: About
item.description: Hello! My name is Andrew Li and I am psychology master student at the University of British Columbia, where I am supervised by Jiaying Zhao. My research focuses on applying psychological principles and insights to address environmental issues. Towards this end, I run field and lab experiments to promote behavior change in waste reduction and climate mitigation. @drewroc6 @andr3wli andrewcli.com andrewc.li@ubc.ca Google Scholar Abbreviated CV Â¶ You can find my full CV hereEducation Â¶ University of British Columbia
